FACT: This is the 3rd #TrumpShutdown this year under a Republican controlled House, Senate, and White House. @HouseDemocrats remain committed to stopping this dysfunction and getting our government back on track when we take the House in January.

.@realDonaldTrump has made it clear that he will prioritize his bigoted, wasteful, & ineffective border wall over anything – even the livelihoods of federal employees & the American people. Democrats in Congress are committed to fully fund the government & avoid a  #TrumpShutdown
